channel.title: Ghosts real or fake?
channel.description:
I just want to know how many people think ghosts are real. I think they are real.
and why you think they are real...
I think the are real because i believe there is one in my house.

item.title: Ghosts real or fake?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I hate topics like this. They’re useless. I really don’t see why people are allowed to make them.

I believe there are poltergeists. I believe there are demons that can embody people’s souls. And I don’t believe in purgatory.

Read full topic

item.title: Ghosts real or fake?

item.description:

thats not realy a question[/quote]

item.title: Ghosts real or fake?
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

Sometimes I feel like a bit of a fag when I say I believe in ghosts, but I can’t say I don’t. I believe that a lot of the ghost hunting things on TV are a load of crap, espcially with that Medium guy that is supposed to have an imaginary friend called sam that can talk to ghosts () I can’t recall the name of the program. I belive ghosts could just a form of energy floating around, but definitally not something that has time traveld. I’m athiest and there for don’t believe in any of that christian crap either.

Read full topic
